extensionDescription.message: Socks proxying made easy. Compatible with SSH tunneling. Allowing 'Run in Private Windows' below is required to override proxy settings.

enabledTitle.description: Browser Action button - title when enabled.

disabledTitle.description: Browser Action button - title when disabled.

optionsHostLabel.description: Options screen label - hostname or IP address

optionsProxyDNSLabel.description: Options screen label - Proxy DNS activation (SOCKS5 only)

optionsPassthroughLabel.description: Options screen label - passthrough hostnames and IP addresses

optionsReloadTabLabel.description: Options screen label - enable/disable tab reload when setting proxy

optionsShowIPV4Label.description: Options screen label - enable/disable IP4 retrieval (via https://api.ipify.org)

optionsShowIPV6Label.description: Options screen label - enable/disable IPv4/v6 retrieval (via https://api64.ipify.org)
